# GET /v2/appStoreVersionExperiments/{id}/relationships/appStoreVersionExperimentTreatments | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ App Store Connect API ](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi)

- [ GET /v2/appStoreVersionExperiments/{id}/relationships/appStoreVersionExperimentTreatments ](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v2-appStoreVersionExperiments-_id_-relationships-appStoreVersionExperimentTreatments)

-  GET /v2/appStoreVersionExperiments/{id}/relationships/appStoreVersionExperimentTreatments 

Web Service Endpoint# GET /v2/appStoreVersionExperiments/{id}/relationships/appStoreVersionExperimentTreatments

App Store Connect API 3.6+## [URL](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v2-appStoreVersionExperiments-_id_-relationships-appStoreVersionExperimentTreatments#url)



```
GET https://api.appstoreconnect.apple.com/v2/appStoreVersionExperiments/{id}/relationships/appStoreVersionExperimentTreatments
```

## [Path Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v2-appStoreVersionExperiments-_id_-relationships-appStoreVersionExperimentTreatments#path-parameters)

`id``string` (Required) 

## [Query Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v2-appStoreVersionExperiments-_id_-relationships-appStoreVersionExperimentTreatments#query-parameters)

`limit``integer`

 Maximum: `200`## [Response Codes](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v2-appStoreVersionExperiments-_id_-relationships-appStoreVersionExperimentTreatments#response-codes)

` 200 OK``[AppStoreVersionExperimentV2AppStoreVersionExperimentTreatmentsLinkagesResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/appstoreversionexperimentv2appstoreversionexperimenttreatmentslinkagesresponse)`OK`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 400 Bad Request``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Bad Request`

 Content-Type: application/json ## [See Also](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v2-appStoreVersionExperiments-_id_-relationships-appStoreVersionExperimentTreatments#see-also)

### [Endpoints](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v2-appStoreVersionExperiments-_id_-relationships-appStoreVersionExperimentTreatments#Endpoints)

[`List All Treatments for an App Store Experiment`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v2-appstoreversionexperiments-_id_-appstoreversionexperimenttreatments)Get a list of all treatments for a specific App Store version experiment.[`GET /v1/appStoreVersionExperimentTreatments/{id}`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-appstoreversionexperimenttreatments-_id_)[`GET /v1/appStoreVersionExperimentTreatments/{id}/appStoreVersionExperimentTreatmentLocalizations`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-appstoreversionexperimenttreatments-_id_-appstoreversionexperimenttreatmentlocalizations)[`GET /v1/appStoreVersionExperimentTreatments/{id}/relationships/appStoreVersionExperimentTreatmentLocalizations`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-appstoreversionexperimenttreatments-_id_-relationships-appstoreversionexperimenttreatmentlocalizations)[`Modify an App Store version experiement treatment`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/patch-v1-appstoreversionexperimenttreatments-_id_)Update the name and app icon name for a specific App Store version experiment.[`POST /v1/appStoreVersionExperimentTreatments`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/post-v1-appstoreversionexperimenttreatments)[`Delete a Treatment for an App Store Version Experiment`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/delete-v1-appstoreversionexperimenttreatments-_id_)Delete metadata that you configured for an App Store Version experiment.
